entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Terrace
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:04 AM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terrace Airport 3:38 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 1.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 90 %
Dewpoint: -0.4°C
Wind: N 32 km/h gust 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending late this evening then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny in the afternoon. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023
